name: curate-bids
label: BIDS Curation
description: Use this gear to initialize BIDS filenames and attributes on all files within a given project.
author: Flywheel <support@flywheel.io>

reset.description: Remove all BIDS info from files before curating

entire_project.description: Run bids curation on the entire project

template_type.description: Which template type to use. Options: Default, ReproIn, or Custom. Note: Custom expects a BIDS Project Curation JSON Template as a project-level file with the filename ending in project-template.json
